creditline: Gift of Ruth and Bruce Dayton
description: water, foreground leads to a cholar crossing a bridge by a pavilion within which another scholar sits; pavilion surrounded by pine trees and bare leafed twisted trees; misty mountain towers over with waterfall and stream
markings: \'Hu T\'ieh-mei\', in ink, at ULC; \'An-ting (Stability), Hu T\'ieh-mei, Yao Ch\'eng-tzu\', seals at ULC and LRC
title: Mountain Hermitage Landscape
